text: @senatemajldr Name one "Economist." I'm sure democrats are combing through your special-interest laden bill that slashes unemployment supplements w/ 23 million unemployed, guts healthcare, doesn't support cities, states, schools or hospitals facing coronavirus & gives payouts to yacht owners.
